name: Fast and Modern Furious Car driving in nice city
name_original: Fast and Modern Furious Car driving in nice city
description:
Fast and Modern Sports Car extreme nice city driving and Furious Racing games

Show your driving skills, race the road and find your ways trough the traffic.
There are different types of vehicles like bus, police car, luxurious car, etc..
In this game you have to click on car and cross the road. you must help cars to ride through crosswalk.
If your car touch any other vehicles or any characters of game then your game will be over.
There are diff diff sound available in this game.
There are 3D different levels for testing your skills in parking.
Collect Checkpoint by parking heavy vehicles...

Key Keatures:-

-> Different bus parking.

-> Realistic Vehicle physics simulation

-> Friendly user interface design

-> Excellent high quality graphics,
